issue.subject: Metadata validation upon INSPIRE validator REST API
issue.description:
One interesting feature would be to propose INSPIRE validation metadata to editors and managers...
See http://inspire-geoportal.ec.europa.eu/validator2/#

journals.notes:
That's a nice idea.

However, does it make sense to add this feature for end users (editors and managers) if we already have a validating feature within EasySDI  ? If the model in well defined AND the validations rules well described, it should be enough.


In any case, this feature should be implemented as an option (parameters in the backend) since INSPIRE rules does not automatically apply to all catalogs  or part of catalogs (ressource contact for example).

Let's talk about it during next PSC.

Bonjour @ tuti.
Oui effectivement, c'est une bonne idée.
Le pousser en front-end via un paramètre en option me paraît judicieux.
